channel.title: About on UX Engineer

item.title: About
item.description: Who is Chris Gibbons? Chris Gibbons is an experienced digital developer specialising in front-end development, with a mild obsession for well written & clean code. After working with the amazing guys at Code Computerlove for 7.5 years, working his way up to Snr. Front End developer. Chris then spent the next 12 months working as a UI engineer at Zuto where he enjoyed the challenge of trying to build a bridge between front-end and UX.
